description: Upper West Side 1 BR- 5th floor walk up. Spacious kitchen with new stainless steel appliances- refrigerator/freezer, microwave, oven, stove, wood kitchen table. Living room with 55" flat screen TV and queen size pull-out futon. Bedroom with queen size bed and built-in drawers, closet, and bathroom. Very safe neighborhood with great restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, central park, and bars nearby. 10 minute walk to Columbia University's main campus-2 blocks away from the 1 train.
name: Cozy Upper West Side 1 bedroom near Central Park
review: Apartment was just as advertised.  Great location for our visit to explore the Upper West Side of New York!  Lots of restaurants, cafes, bakeries, and bars to suit all tastes!  Hosts were very responsive to emails prior to our arrival and I did not need to reach out during our stay as all went smoothly.   Apartment on the 5th floor and no elevator so keep this in mind if stairs are a problem.  Otherwise, nice place to rest at the end of your day in the city.
